field.name: show_data
field.label: Data Count
field.description: You can choose to show or hide the data count bubbles next to the buttons. If you decide to show the data, please keep in mind that this may slightly will slow down the loading speed.

field.name: jquery_lib
field.label: jQuery Library
field.description: This option is only needed for Joomla 2.5 version. Please disable the jQuery library if it is loaded by other extension to avoid any javascript conflict.
